name: Button
description:
A simple push-button.

Note: this service will stream readings while the button is pressed and shortly after it's released, even
when `stream_samples == 0`. TODO remove this?

contents.name: stream_samples
contents.description:
Asks device to stream a given number of samples
(clients will typically write `255` to this register every second or so, while streaming is required).

contents.name: streaming_interval
contents.description: Period between packets of data when streaming in milliseconds.

contents.name: pressed
contents.description: Indicates whether the button is currently active (pressed).

contents.name: down
contents.description: Emitted when button goes from inactive (`pressed == 0`) to active.

contents.name: up
contents.description: Emitted when button goes from active (`pressed == 1`) to inactive.

contents.name: click
contents.description: Emitted together with `up` when the press time was not longer than 500ms.

contents.name: long_click
contents.description: Emitted together with `up` when the press time was more than 500ms.
